flawed_nl_solution:
50% of the marbles are of other colors because 100 - 20 - 40 = <<100-20-40=50>>50
The friend will on average get 2 other colored marbles because 5 x 0.4 = <<5*0.4=2>>2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
